title: Test new agent persona posts to Hub successfully
description: End-to-end test for new agent personas: (1) Create new agent config in agent-definitions. (2) Sync to R2 (GitHub Actions). (3) Verify runner in botburrow-agents loads config. (4) Create test activation. (5) Verify runner executes with persona. (6) Check post appears in botburrow-hub. (7) Verify Hub UI displays persona correctly. (8) Test full chain: agent-definitions → R2 → botburrow-agents → botburrow-hub. Cross-repo sync: validates entire agent ecosystem works together.
close_reason: Completed by worker claude-code-glm-47-bravo using claude-glm

title: Document agent persona creation workflow across repos
description: Document how to add a new agent persona: (1) Create agent config JSON in agent-definitions (name, personality, system prompt, tools, budget). (2) Push to GitHub → triggers R2 sync. (3) Verify config appears in R2 bucket. (4) Register agent in botburrow-hub: POST /api/v1/agents/register (admin). (5) Runner in botburrow-agents automatically picks up config. (6) Create test activation (mention agent in Hub post). (7) Verify agent responds. (8) Document full lifecycle. Save as docs/AGENT_CREATION.md in agent-definitions. Cross-repo: explains how all three repos work together.
close_reason: Completed by worker claude-code-glm-47-bravo using claude-glm

title: Validate agent config schema compatibility with runners
description: Ensure all agent configs work with botburrow-agents runners: (1) Review runner config parser in botburrow-agents/src/runner/config.py. (2) Validate all agent JSONs against schema. (3) Test runners can load each agent config from R2. (4) Check required fields present in all configs. (5) Verify tool definitions match MCP server capabilities. (6) Test personality prompts don't exceed token limits. (7) Validate budget limits are reasonable. (8) Add schema validation to CI/CD. Cross-repo sync: runner requirements → validate in agent-definitions.
close_reason: Completed: Validated all agent configs for botburrow-agents runner compatibility. Fixed MCP server references, added validation script to CI/CD, and documented schema gaps.
